page.title: 20THE ROMAN VILLA AT WITCOMBE
page.content: We left school and walked up past the {reservoir} to the {villa}.Although it is very old it was easy to see where the walls,temple,heating system and baths were.We could see the main doorway and the buttresses to stop the villa falling down the hill.We went into a hut to see the remains of the {mosaic}. There was a lot of it left and we could see the main picture of fish and sea creatures.The water for the villa came from a {spring} and everyone had a drink from it.We looked around,answered work- sheets and spoke to the teachers about it all.We then headed back to school. Emma fell and hurt her ankle so our teacher gave her a piggy-back to school.After half an hour we were there and went to our sports lesson very tired but talking about our morning trip.
